execute_python.description: Execute Python code and return the output

parameters.code: string - The Python code to execute

execute_bash.description: Execute bash command and return the output

parameters.command: string - The bash command to execute

search_docs.description: Search Python documentation for a topic

analyze_code.description: Analyze code for errors, complexity, or patterns

run_tests.description: Run unit tests for the given code

parameters.code: string - The code with test cases
